message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You were too generous, I'll take a bit more this time!
You took a bit too much, I'll give you a bit more, but not too much!
You're getting closer to my target, but I'm not there yet!
I'm getting closer to my target too, let's meet in the middle!
You're getting close to the bottom, I'm taking the lead!
I'm not giving up yet, I'll give you a bit more, but not that much!
You're running out of time, I'm taking control!
I'm not giving up yet, I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not out of options!
You're almost out of time, this is my final offer!
I'm not giving up yet, I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not out of options... yet!
This is my last chance, take it or leave it!
